EmailTemplate.name: Tyler Campaign 1 Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Beware of bears
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I've been trying to get in touch with you to snag a quick phone call to talk about Livongo, and haven't had much luck. This leads me to believe one of three things:
1) Lowering diabetes-related costs and improving the welfare of your employees is not a priority right now
2) You are interested in learning how we can help you lower diabetes-related costs and improve the welfare of your employees, but you're super busy
3) You've been eaten by a bear
Whether it's 1, 2, or 3 - please let me know... because I'm terrified of bears and would need to keep an eye out the next time I'm in your area.
All the best,
Tyler Vandenberg Sales Development Representative at Livongo Livongo o: 312.357.5540 e: tvandenberg@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
